Original: Ah... that is from the Outland Count.
He has apparently found another old
document.
[Page]
He wants your help in deciphering it.
You must visit him for the details...
I shall await your swift return.
Translation: Ah... that is from the Outland Count.
He has apparently found another old
document.
[Page]
He wants your help in deciphering it.
You must visit him for the details...
I shall await your swift return.

Original: Welcome back. The Outland Count made
mention of a "water mark"...?
[Page]
The Cloudy Stronghold is the ruin of
an ancient civilization. One never
knows what one may find there.
[Page]
Whether mystery is piled upon mystery
or the truth is revealed for all to
see depends on you...
Translation: Welcome back. The Outland Count made
mention of a "water mark"...?
[Page]
The Cloudy Stronghold is the ruin of
an ancient civilization. One never
knows what one may find there.
[Page]
Whether mystery is piled upon mystery
or the truth is revealed for all to
see depends on you...

Original: You accepted my request? Ah, that is
a relief. Even Margherita is pleased
to see you again.
[Page]
Do you recall the document from which
we derived the coordinates of Area 1?
[Page]
Well, we have just unearthed a new
document with similar notation.
Allow me to read it to you...
Translation: You accepted my request? Ah, that is
a relief. Even Margherita is pleased
to see you again.
[Page]
Do you recall the document from which
we derived the coordinates of Area 1?
[Page]
Well, we have just unearthed a new
document with similar notation.
Allow me to read it to you...

Original: "Starting from [Color:5]Area 1[Color:0], if you follow
a specific route to the endpoint, the
[Color:5]water mark[Color:0] will very likely react.
[Page]
"The current waypoints for the route
are [Color:5](C-4/5-4)[Color:0] and [Color:5](B-5/3-2)[Color:0].
[Page]
"The endpoint is estimated to be
somewhere in [Color:5]A-4[Color:0]... We estimate our
progress to be at 25%."
Translation: "Starting from [Color:5]Area 1[Color:0], if you follow
a specific route to the endpoint, the
[Color:5]water mark[Color:0] will very likely react.
[Page]
"The current waypoints for the route
are [Color:5](C-4/5-4)[Color:0] and [Color:5](B-5/3-2)[Color:0].
[Page]
"The endpoint is estimated to be
somewhere in [Color:5]A-4[Color:0]... We estimate our
progress to be at 25%."

Original: It ends there. The documents before
and after this, which might have given
some context, are missing.
[Page]
Your task will be to [Color:5]cause whatever
reaction[Color:0] the document speaks of and
[Color:5]pinpoint the site[Color:0] of this water mark.
[Page]
Once the reaction begins, try to find
the mark. If you can do that much, I
shall be satisfied. Oh, take this...
[Page]
It is an unknown device found in the
husk of an Imperial skyship along with
the document. It may prove useful.
[Page]
I am counting on you, my friends. See?
Even Margherita has high hopes.
Translation: It ends there. The documents before
and after this, which might have given
some context, are missing.
[Page]
Your task will be to [Color:5]cause whatever
reaction[Color:0] the document speaks of and
[Color:5]pinpoint the site[Color:0] of this water mark.
[Page]
Once the reaction begins, try to find
the mark. If you can do that much, I
shall be satisfied. Oh, take this...
[Page]
It is an unknown device found in the
husk of an Imperial skyship along with
the document. It may prove useful.
[Page]
I am counting on you, my friends. See?
Even Margherita has high hopes.

Original: How are you faring? Did you cause a
reaction, like the document said?
Translation: How are you faring? Did you cause a
reaction, like the document said?

Original: [Color:5]Did you make it react?[Color:0]
Yes
No
I need more information
Translation: [Color:5]Did you make it react?[Color:0]
Yes
No
I need more information

Original: Hrm...
Translation: Hrm...

Original: Again, then...
Translation: Again, then...

Original: Come now... Are you deliberately
attempting to get a rise out of me?
[Page]
Where is your explorer's spirit? Do
you intend to leave me consistently
disappointed?
[Page]
If that is the case, then I shall
disappoint you as well. Go try again.
Translation: Come now... Are you deliberately
attempting to get a rise out of me?
[Page]
Where is your explorer's spirit? Do
you intend to leave me consistently
disappointed?
[Page]
If that is the case, then I shall
disappoint you as well. Go try again.

Original: Of course. I'll read the document one
more time.
Translation: Of course. I'll read the document one
more time.

Original: It sounds as if it is directing you
to [Color:5]fly a set route[Color:0], after which you
will most likely see a reaction...
[Page]
The starting point is Area 1, at
(D-2/4-5). From there, you must fly
[Page]
Once you travel over those three
points, your destination is somewhere
in A-4... That's as much as we know.
Translation: It sounds as if it is directing you
to [Color:5]fly a set route[Color:0], after which you
will most likely see a reaction...
[Page]
The starting point is Area 1, at
(D-2/4-5). From there, you must fly
[Page]
Once you travel over those three
points, your destination is somewhere
in A-4... That's as much as we know.

Original: Truly!? Then tell me the spot where
you saw the reaction!
Translation: Truly!? Then tell me the spot where
you saw the reaction!

Original: Understood. I will send my swiftest
scouts...!
Translation: Understood. I will send my swiftest
scouts...!

Original: We did it, my friends! The spot you
told us to look for was emanating
a faint light.
[Page]
It has already faded, but on the stone
floor at its base, there is a water
mark engraved.
[Page]
I wonder what it means... This mystery
is not yet fully solved. But with your
help, perhaps it will be.
[Page]
You are free to go to the Dancing
Peacock now to claim your well-earned
reward. Thank you, my friends!
Translation: We did it, my friends! The spot you
told us to look for was emanating
a faint light.
[Page]
It has already faded, but on the stone
floor at its base, there is a water
mark engraved.
[Page]
I wonder what it means... This mystery
is not yet fully solved. But with your
help, perhaps it will be.
[Page]
You are free to go to the Dancing
Peacock now to claim your well-earned
reward. Thank you, my friends!

Original: As I thought, this land still holds
many secrets... I may have another
request for you quite soon.
Translation: As I thought, this land still holds
many secrets... I may have another
request for you quite soon.

Original: My scouts flew to the point you told
us to try, but there was no reaction
visible there.
[Page]
Was that the right spot? You... did
confirm the reaction according to the
document, yes?
[Page]
Try it once more and report back
to me. Hurry, before Margherita
grows cross!
Translation: My scouts flew to the point you told
us to try, but there was no reaction
visible there.
[Page]
Was that the right spot? You... did
confirm the reaction according to the
document, yes?
[Page]
Try it once more and report back
to me. Hurry, before Margherita
grows cross!

Original: Suddenly, the device you received from
the Outland Count pings. You look and
see that the needle is pointing to 1.
Translation: Suddenly, the device you received from
the Outland Count pings. You look and
see that the needle is pointing to 1.

Original: Suddenly, the device you received from
the Outland Count pings. You look and
see that the needle is pointing to 2.
Translation: Suddenly, the device you received from
the Outland Count pings. You look and
see that the needle is pointing to 2.

Original: Suddenly, the device you received from
the Outland Count pings. You look and
find the needle has returned to 0...
Translation: Suddenly, the device you received from
the Outland Count pings. You look and
find the needle has returned to 0...

Original: Suddenly, the device you received from
the Outland Count pings. You look and
see that the needle is pointing to 3.
Translation: Suddenly, the device you received from
the Outland Count pings. You look and
see that the needle is pointing to 3.

Original: Suddenly, the device you received from
the Outland Count pings. You look and
find the needle has returned to 0...
Translation: Suddenly, the device you received from
the Outland Count pings. You look and
find the needle has returned to 0...

Original: Suddenly, the device you received from
the Outland Count pings. You look and
see that the needle is pointing to 4.
Translation: Suddenly, the device you received from
the Outland Count pings. You look and
see that the needle is pointing to 4.

Original: Suddenly, the device you received from
the Outland Count pings. You look and
find the needle has returned to 0...
Translation: Suddenly, the device you received from
the Outland Count pings. You look and
find the needle has returned to 0...

Original: Suddenly, the device you received from
the Outland Count pings. You look and
see that the needle is pointing to 5.
Translation: Suddenly, the device you received from
the Outland Count pings. You look and
see that the needle is pointing to 5.

Original: Suddenly, the device you received from
the Outland Count pings. You look and
find the needle has returned to 0...
Translation: Suddenly, the device you received from
the Outland Count pings. You look and
find the needle has returned to 0...

Original: Suddenly, the device you received from
the Outland Count pings. You look and
see that the needle is pointing to 6.
Translation: Suddenly, the device you received from
the Outland Count pings. You look and
see that the needle is pointing to 6.

Original: Suddenly, the device you received from
the Outland Count pings. You look and
find the needle has returned to 0...
Translation: Suddenly, the device you received from
the Outland Count pings. You look and
find the needle has returned to 0...

Original: Suddenly, the device you received from
the Outland Count pings. You look and
see that the needle is pointing to 7.
[Page]
The next instant, you hear a strange
sound from the southwest! It seems to
be reacting to something.
[Page]
The sound came from nearby. You move
to explore the surrounding area...
Translation: Suddenly, the device you received from
the Outland Count pings. You look and
see that the needle is pointing to 7.
[Page]
The next instant, you hear a strange
sound from the southwest! It seems to
be reacting to something.
[Page]
The sound came from nearby. You move
to explore the surrounding area...

Original: As you go in search of the sound,
you notice a dim glow from the stone
pavement below.
Translation: As you go in search of the sound,
you notice a dim glow from the stone
pavement below.

Original: You see a water-like symbol engraved,
from which the light emanates.
[Page]
This must be the [Color:5]water mark[Color:0] mentioned
in the document! You have succeeded
in causing it to react!
[Page]
You should go straight away to the
Outland Count and inform him where
the mark can be found!
Translation: You see a water-like symbol engraved,
from which the light emanates.
[Page]
This must be the [Color:5]water mark[Color:0] mentioned
in the document! You have succeeded
in causing it to react!
[Page]
You should go straight away to the
Outland Count and inform him where
the mark can be found!

Original: You hear a strange sound coming from
the [Color:5]southwest[Color:0].
[Page]
Perhaps the water mark has reacted
from someplace not far off. You move
to explore the surrounding area...
Translation: You hear a strange sound coming from
the [Color:5]southwest[Color:0].
[Page]
Perhaps the water mark has reacted
from someplace not far off. You move
to explore the surrounding area...

Original: A dim glow is emanating from the water
mark engraved into the stone...
Translation: A dim glow is emanating from the water
mark engraved into the stone...
